example.name: missing second arguer
example.text: Campeau's Ms. Sanger disputes Mr. Konheim's comments.

example.name: ARG0 and ARG2
example.text: The Pentagon spokesman is meanwhile disputing news reports saying the Defense Department has decided to order US Navy ships to temporarily stop using the Suez Canal out of fear of terrorist attack .

example.name: ARG0
example.text: Men are giving away nothing to their sisters in the search for beautiful bodies , as is suggested by a few recent disputes between male beauty salons and dissatisfied customers .
